thread.title: Macron must fill rights void left by Trump - Human Rights Watch

title: Macron must fill rights void left by Trump - Human Rights Watch
text:
Macron must fill rights void left by Trump - Human Rights Watch 11:12am EST - 01:10 
Human Righs Watch director Ken Roth has criticised Donald Trump, saying he's been a ''disaster for human rights'' and that the French president must take control of the situation. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
Human Righs Watch director Ken Roth has criticised Donald Trump, saying he's been a "disaster for human rights" and that the French president must take control of the situation. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2mMPsWx
